name: Bullet game
description:
Control the bullet to hit the target, or lose as an inept shooter.n tutorial you can lern how to play.

In infinity mode, you should just collect bottles and avoid an obstacles, try not to lose.

If you want to check the code of this game, here you have link to github:

https://github.com/SerhiiKarpenko/Bullet_Game/tree/master

Good luck!
